data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: I am learning to speak Japanese at school this year. I ____ in ____ second ____ class ____. The ____ thing ____ me ____ learning ____ words - I ____ never ____ them. But my Japanese-English dictionary helps me do my homework.
data.partBlankContent: I am learning to speak Japanese at school this year. I a_ in m_ second Japa____ class n__. The har____ thing f__ me i_ learning n__ words - I c__ never reme____ them. But my Japanese-English dictionary helps me do my homework.
data.fullContent: I am learning to speak Japanese at school this year. I am in my second Japanese class now. The hardest thing for me is learning new words - I can never remember them. But my Japanese-English dictionary helps me do my homework.
data.answer: 今年我在学校学日语。我现在在上第二节日语课。对我来说，最难的事情是学习新单词——我总是记不住它们。但是我的日英词典帮助我做作业。
